title: InstantiateMsg
description: This structure stores general parameters for the contract.

beneficiary.description: The beneficiary address to received fees in stablecoin

max_spread.description: The maximum spread used when swapping fee tokens to stablecoin

owner.description: Address that's allowed to change contract parameters

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
